structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.catch_line: Additional powers of cabinet -- Administrative regulations -- Education and training.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 69, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 17, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 304, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 249, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1) and (9). -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 106, Art. XI, sec. 3.
